name: Clipping Path Service
description: Clipping Path Service is a popular Photoshop photo editing technique. The clipping path is a closed vector path or a shape which we used to make the subject’s outline by using the pen tool.

name: Background Removal Service
description: Background removal is a method of removing an ugly or clumsy background of an image. It can enhance the beauty of your pictures.

name: Photo Retouching Service
description: All photos are not perfect, although it was shot by a professional photographer. Sometimes we get worse photos because of our lighting setup. To give it the perfect look, photographers need professional photo retouching.

name: Color Changing and Correction
description: Color correction is a basic photo manipulation process that includes adjustment of the color, saturation, white balance, exposure of an image.

name: Shadow Making Services
description: A shadow helps subjects look grounded in the subject’s background. If you will make your product shadow then it looks more realistic and attractive.

name: Photo Enhancement Service
description: Photo Enhancement is a process of fixing digital photos. Improving an image is effectively a picture’s stylization. Select color or black and white, darkening the image corner, improving picture quality.
